quizzes_description: Take a quiz to get access to the server.
quiz_completed_desc: Your submission has been recorded. You will be notified of the result.
profile_synced_success: Your profile has been successfully updated!
no_applications_submitted: You haven't submitted any applications yet.
unlink_confirm: Are you sure you want to unlink your MTA account?
mta_not_linked_desc: Link your in-game account to view your stats and characters here.
no_admin_records: No admin records found for this account.

link_account.title: Link MTA Account
link_account.description: Link your MTA:SA game account with your Discord and website profile
link_account.subtitle: Connect your MTA account with Discord
link_account.already_linked_subtitle: Your profile is currently linked to the following game account:
link_account.success_subtitle: You can now return to the game and press the refresh button to see your info.
link_account.step_3: Press the "Generate Code" button and copy it.
link_account.step_4: Paste the code in the field below and press "Link Account".
link_account.feature_1_desc: Your account is linked to your device's Serial to ensure it cannot be stolen.
link_account.feature_2_desc: Once linked, your information will appear in-game and on the website instantly.
link_account.link_error: An error occurred while trying to link the account
